SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_WRITE_DATE FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_WRITE_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT BOARD_IMG_NO, BOARD_IMG_PATH, BOARD_IMG_ORIGINAL_NAME, BOARD_IMG_RENAME, BOARD_IMG_ORDER, B.GROUP_NO, BOARD_IMG_PATH || BOARD_IMG_RENAME AS "FILE_LOCATION"
FROM "BOARD_IMG" BI LEFT JOIN "BOARD" B ON (B.BOARD_NO = BI.BOARD_NO)
WHERE B.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} FETCH FIRST 6 ROWS ONLY

SELECT SCHEDULE_DATE - CURRENT_DATE AS D_DAY, TO_CHAR(SCHEDULE_DATE, 'MM"월" DD"일" HH24"시" II"분" "("DY")"') AS SCHEDULE_DATE, LOCATION, COST, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SCHEDULE_MEMBER SM WHERE SM.SCHEDULE_NO = B.SCHEDULE_NO ) AS "MEMBER_COUNT"
FROM SCHEDULE B
WHERE B.GROUP_NO = #{groupNo} ORDER BY SCHEDULE_DATE DESC FETCH FIRST 6 ROWS ONLY
